description:
Winter workouts can be hard to visualise, but these Thermal tights give you the whole picture. With a technical mixed fabric to give you maximum stretch and durability with ankle zippers for versatility, these will get you out in the cold in no time.

  • Polyester and Nylon mix fabric provides a durable and plush feel, while added spandex create a stretchy fabric to move with you
  • Elastic waistband and drawstring allow you to personalize the fit
  • Ankle zips provide an easy on and off with a variety of shoe styles making these great for high or low shoes
name: Kari Traa Tirill Thermal Tights - Women's
